actions.text: On agreeing to the Levin amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 187 - 226 (Roll no. 208).
Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Levin.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Levin.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Levin amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 187 - 226 (Roll no. 208).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 187 - 226 (Roll no. 208).
Roll call votes on amendments in House

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to make the existing child tax credit permanent, indexed to inflation; make the tax credit available to families making less than $110,000; accelerate the increase in the refundable portion of the credit, from 10 percent to 15 percent; provide the tax credit to low income individuals; and offset the costs of the bill with an additional tax on high income taxpayers.
purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to add a complete new text.
